transArray.content: The service is very good and considerate, especially for traveling with children. Thumbs up to the lady at the front desküëç

Thank you very much for your stay and sharing, and also thank you for your high recognition of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The smile on your lips is our greatest appreciation. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay. Environment, all the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you all the best! Manager: Zhang Minghui
